thread.title: Simon
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Simon

author: Simon
title: Simon
text: Tried the jacket on in a shop, loved it but thought I would check the net for cheaper. So glad I did, same Barbour but Â£70 cheaper. Bought it at 14:30 online and it turned up next day by 11am.. Amazing price, great jacket and spot on delivery and saved a few quid as well...winner
